connect.text: Download Tari Universe Mobile and track your real-time XTM balance anywhere. Get it now for iOS or Android.
connect.textButton: Learn more about Tari Universe Mobile
connect.title: Track your XTM balance on your phone

qrcode.text: Scan the QR code to sync your Universe wallet with Tari Universe Mobile on your phone. When prompted, enter the security code below in Tari Universe Mobile and follow the steps in the app.
qrcode.title: Sync Universe with Tari Universe Mobile
qrcode.warning: Do not share this QR code
